DocLocalization.Name: DÃ©finition de section d'un profil en L

DocAttribute.Name: Depth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Leg length, see illustration above (= h). Same as the overall depth.

DocAttribute.Name: Width
DocAttribute.Documentation: Leg length, see illustration above (= b). Same as the overall width. This attribute is formally optional for historic reasons only. Whenever the width is known, it shall be provided by value.

DocAttribute.Name: Thickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Constant wall thickness of profile, see illustration above (= ts).

DocAttribute.Name: FilletRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Fillet radius according the above illustration (= r1).

DocAttribute.Name: EdgeRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Edge radius according the above illustration (= r2).

DocAttribute.Name: LegSlope
DocAttribute.Documentation: Slope of the inner face of each leg of the profile.

DocWhereRule.Name: ValidThickness
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The thickness shall be smaller than the depth and width.
